content.en: Text clustering algorithms: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms to improve text clustering in information retrieval. These algorithms, such as Swarm Intelligence, Particle Swarm Optimization, Firefly Algorithm, and others, are inspired by nature and aim to automatically group similar documents together. By comparing these algorithms to traditional techniques, researchers are investigating their effectiveness in improving the clustering of text documents.
content.da: Tekstklassificeringsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre tekstklassificering i informationshentning. Disse algoritmer, såsom Swarm Intelligence, Particle Swarm Optimization, Firefly Algorithm og andre, er inspireret af naturen og har til formål automatisk at gruppere lignende dokumenter sammen. Ved at sammenligne disse algoritmer med traditionelle teknikker undersøger forskere deres effektivitet i at forbedre klassificeringen af tekstdokumenter.
